abstract: Donald J Trump faces challenge in getting throngs of supporters, many of whom are Republicans disillusioned with politics, to vote in primaries and caucuses that are often dominated by party stalwarts in Iowa and other states; success of presidential campaign could hinge on ability of activists and volunteers to motivate followers to go to polls.
lead_paragraph: Donald J. Trump is putting in place a robust field operation in Iowa, but converting raucous crowds into votes in primaries and caucuses remains a challenge.

headline.main: Test for Donald Trump: Turning Crowds Into Real Voters
headline.print_headline: Turning Crowds Into Real Voters Is Trump’s Test

snippet: Donald J. Trump is putting in place a robust field operation in Iowa, but converting raucous crowds into votes in primaries and caucuses remains a challenge.
